titles.title: I keep coming back to the well of grace,

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I keep coming back to the well of grace,
Great is its power and sweet is the taste,
Whatever temptations and trials I face,
I keep coming back to the well.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Blessed is the fountain in a barren land,
Satisfies the thirst of the inner man,
No better place could be found to dwell,
I thank God for the well.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus made a well at Calvary,
For healing, cleansing, and victory,
My joy overflows, no tongue can tell,
Oh, won't you come to the well?
